required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Dual-targeting HER2 and PD-L1 CAR-T for Cancers With Pleural or Peritoneal Metastasis
clinical_study.official_title: Phase I Study of Specific CAR-T Dual-targeting HER2 and PD-L1 in Patients With Pleural or Peritoneal Metastasis of HER2 Positive Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: Serosal cavity metastasis of malignant tumor is one of the late complications, which seriously affects the quality of life and survival time of patients. HER-2 is frequently expressed in breast cancer, ovarian cancer, lung cancer, gastric cancer and other malignant tumors. The HER-2/PD-L1 dual-targeting CAR-T will be investigated in patients with HER2 positive solid tumor serosal cavity metastases.

primary_outcome.description: AE during the first 28 days after CAR-T cell administration
Baseline up to 28 days after CAR-T cells infusion

secondary_outcome.description: The time from achievement of disease control

arm_group.description: Dual-targeting HER2 and PD-L1 CAR-T cell therapy

intervention.intervention_name: Dual-targeting HER2 and PD-L1 CAR-T cells

responsible_party.investigator_title: Director of Institute of Drug Clinical Trial of West China Hospital
